channel.title: MySQL on 牧人池塘
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on 牧人池塘

item.title: mysql_secure_installation报错Error: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/data/mysql/mysql.sock' 解决
item.description: MySQL重新初始化以后，使用mysql_secure_installation报错找不到mysql.sock文件，地址是老的文件地址： 1[root@kgoatestdb mysql_logs]#

item.title: MySQL8.0.31统计信息更新INFORMATION_SCHEMA
item.description: 导入完数据以后查看最大的表 top 10： 1root@kgoatestdb 16:55:51 [(none)]>select table_schema,table_name,table_rows from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables order by table_rows desc limit 10; 2+--------------+----------------------------+------------+ 3| table_schema | table_name | table_rows | 4+--------------+----------------------------+------------+ 5| oadb | schedulerunlog | 2158070 | 6| oadb | hrmonlinecount | 1321563 | 7| oadb | hrmsysmaintenancelog | 538537 | 8| oadb | workflow_trackdetail | 353748 | 9| oadb | workflow_node_fix_flowtime

item.title: Win11部署MySQL Community Server 8.0.31 绿色免安装
item.description: 1、先在MySQL官方下载安装包： 1--MySQL官方下载地址: 2https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/ 3--直接下载地址： 4https://cdn.mysql.com//Downloads/MySQL-8.0/mysql-8.0.31-winx64.zip 2、解压并设置环境变量： 将mysql-8.0.31-
